topic.title: Team Favorites and Tabs page
topic.note: This section refers to the management page for team favorites and tabs - not the process of viewing cards based on team favorites.

section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: The Team Favorites and Tabs page displays all the team favorites and any tabs that you or other team members have saved while filtering cards in Mingle. Team favorites are a shortcut for team members to quickly access elements of the project workflow that are relevant to them. From here you can also create new tabs in Mingle (based on a favorite), remove an existing tab, or delete a favorite.
